alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Greene; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 12:00PM EST until March 09 at 7:18PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Rivervale. East Fork White River near Bedford. East Fork White River at Williams. White River at Hazleton. White River at Petersburg. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Spencer. White River at Edwardsport. White River at Newberry. White River at Elliston. .Minor flooding is ongoing along the White river and several tributaries across central and southern Indiana due to 1.5 to 3 inches of rainfall that fell Friday March 3rd. Flooding is ongoing along the lower White River from Spencer to Hazleton, with the crest near Newberry. Flooding along many smaller tributaries that has not already ended will end by Tuesday. Flooding will continue through the middle to end of the week over much of the White river but into next week at Petersburg and Hazleton. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Elliston. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Extensive flooding of agricultural lands begin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 23.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM EST Tuesday was 23.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday morning and continue falling to 8.8 feet Friday, March 17. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
